sourceMeaningMnemonic: You put <radical>flowers</radical> on a <radical>cloud</radical> and call it <kanji>art</kanji>. Not everyone agrees that your flower cloud art is actually art, but you know it is.
meaningInfo: Imagine piling up flowers on top of clouds to make your own unique art. It’s a fiddly business, because they keep falling through the clouds, but you get there in the end. Now step back and marvel at your work of flower cloud art.
readingMnemonic: Your beautiful <kanji>art</kanji> is going to be displayed at a <reading>gay</reading> (<ja>げい</ja>) club. Imagine the pride you feel about having your art on display.
readingInfo: Picture the gay club with your art displayed behind the bar. Fame and fortune are just around the corner, now.
